General.Name: CBLT Inc
General.Description: CBLT Inc., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the acquisition, exploration, development, and sale of mineral properties in Canada. The company explores for cobalt, gold, silver, copper, and zinc. The company's project portfolio includes the Copper Prince property, the Northshore property, the Geneva Lake property, the Chilton Cobalt property, the Big Duck Lake property, the Auden property, the Burnt Pond property, and the Shatford Lake property, as well as the Peggy, Ryliejack, and SK West properties; and the Mikayla, Tat, and Chess properties. The company was formerly known as Green Swan Capital Corp. and changed its name to CBLT Inc. in June 2017. CBLT Inc. was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Burlington, Canada.
General.Address: 3310 South Service Road, Burlington, ON, Canada, L7N 3M6
